text: What is your full name?

How would you rate your typical stress level?

For women only: have you ever used hormone replacement therapy?
For men only: have you noticed erectile difficulties?
Do you have any known food allergies or intolerances?
In the past year, have you unintentionally lost more than 5 kg?
Do you often feel short of breath on mild exertion?
Have you ever been told you have fatty liver disease or abnormal liver tests?
Do you have a family history of any of the following cancers?
Do you have known genetic results (e.g., BRCA, APOE, FH)?
Enter your most recent blood pressure reading if known
